content: The Black Wind King is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle of Black Wind Cave, this is the first of two forms you'll fight the self-imposed King of Black Wind Mountain. Even in his human form, he can be incredibly powerful.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_King.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind King'.
The content is as follows:
The Black Wind King is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle of Black Wind Cave, this is the first of two forms you'll fight the self-imposed King of Black Wind Mountain. Even in his human form, he can be incredibly powerful.
